items.title: Search Workspace (BETA)
items.description: A new Search Workspace has been added to the platform to allow for more granular searching of data within the platform.  In a future release, the Search Workspace will allow for proxying searches to external data sources using a SearchProxy role in the agent.

items.title: Detections
items.description:
- Detection rules now support templated descriptions that will automatically populate the description with data from the event.  For example consider the description of: *"This is a test alert for {{ winlog.computer_name }}"*, the value in the braces will be replaced with the value of the field `winlog.computer_name`.
- Detection rules can now be edited directly from the Event Drawer of the event fired from the rule.
- Users with the `sync_local_subscribers` permission can now force synchronize all Detection Repository subscribers from a single action, instead of having to wait for the sync interval or log into the tenant and force sync.
- Detection Repository Subscriptions can now be edited without having to delete the subscription and resubscribe.

items.title: Events
items.description: - The Event Drawer will now show the name, descriptions, actions and the query for each Event Rule that matched for the specified event.
